Name: Ryclaw: Hope
About the game: Ryclaw: Hope is a short kinetic novel about a young girl named Sakura who has spent most of her life in the hospital. Coming home for the first time in months, Sakura has a dream that she wants to make a reality. You play as her older brother, who has raised Sakura since the passing of their parents. Spend time with your precocious little sister and help her wish come true. 5 Steam Achievements 15 minute reading time 78 character illustrations
